XRP is more fungible than Bitcoin. One XRP is indistinguishable from another, unlike with Bitcoin. Miners have free will over which txns to include in a block and nothing guarantees that certain UTXOs won’t be censored -esp if ordered by China.

Ripple is more immutable than BTC. A 51% attack can’t reverse/alter. The ledger headers would disagree w/ data in the database and a simple ledger_cleaner call would remove these entries again. Historic data integrity is one of the main reasons why Ripple uses a blockchain.
